attributes.action: Ban the importing of animal tested cosmetic products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government rightly banned cosmetic animal testing during their first term in office, however foreign animal tested cosmetic products such as L'oreal continue to be imported to the United Kingdom. This petition asks the Prime Minister to extend the ban to foreign products.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban the importing of animal tested cosmetic products."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14719.asp

Prime Minister's Office
